actions.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Mathias. With written report No. 99-241.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 529.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing the printing of a revised edition of Senate document numbered 99-23, entitled "Senate Election Law Guidebook 1984" as a Senate document.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Authorizes the printing of a revised edition of the "Senate Election Law Guidebook 1984" as a Senate document and additional copies for the use of the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing the printing of a revised edition of Senate document numbered 99-23, entitled "Senate Election Law Guidebook 1984" as a Senate document.
